My Work

Research Interest

My PhD research lies within the field of Industrial Engineering in general and within Green Supply Chain Management (GSCM) & Sustainable Supply Chain Management (SSCM) topics. Here I found the influential role of pressures and barriers for the adoption of GSCM and SSCM with the help of Multi Criteria Decision Making (MCDM) approaches. In addition, Further, he extends research focus on Sustainable Lean Manufacturing, Lean Six-Sigma, Public Distribution System were conducted within theoretical method development, as well as within real-life applications.
